ValidationRule.description: If 'Other' is selected as Surgeon specialty, then 'other specialty' must be completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND(TEXT(Specialty__pc ) = 'Other', Other_Specialty__pc = ''), AND(TEXT( Specialty__pc ) <> 'Other', Len(Other_Specialty__pc) > 0))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid combination of Specialty / Other Specialty
